verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
With my hands lifted up,
And my mouth filled with praise,
With a heart of thanksgiving,
I will bless Thee O Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I will bless Thee O Lord, I will bless Thee O Lord,
With a heart of thanksgiving,
I will bless Thee O Lord.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Con mis manos alzadas, y alabanza en mi boca,
Corazon agradecido, te bendigo Se単or.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Te bendigo Se単or, te bendigo Se単or,
Corazon agradecido, te bendigo Se単or,
